output.dependency: The unique identifier for each movie, represented by a specific code, semantically ties to the movie title as it allows retrieval of movie details based on its code.
The movie title semantically influences the genres it may belong to, as titles are often reflective of their thematic content.
The release year of the movie has a semantic dependency with the release date, as the year is part of the overall release information.
The language of the movie may determine the country of origin, suggesting that movies in a particular language are often produced in specific countries.
The duration of the movie may have a dependency on the user rating; films with similar lengths may receive similar ratings.
The filming location may provide additional context to the release year, as certain places are known for cinema from specific periods.
